channel.title: Questions comments thoughts and concerns?
channel.description:
yes i have a few XD
Questions: 1. What do you do to host a server?
Comments: 1. none that would be spam XDDD
thoughts: None also spam
Concerns: 1. can i find out if anyone can connect to my server
ps. for those asking why i said questions comments thoughts or concerns? because my teacher says it and he=awsome so im trying to act more like him XD

item.title: Questions comments thoughts and concerns?
item.dc:creator: @Nirvana.Marijuana Nirvana.Marijuana
item.description:
@Nirvana.Marijuana wrote:

You click on the blue button with the triangle to make a new network then people connect to it using the ip you see at the top of your hamachi

Read full topic

item.title: Questions comments thoughts and concerns?
item.dc:creator: @spiritlord99 spiritlord99
item.description:
@spiritlord99 wrote:

if i were u i would use hamachi
1 first download hamachi
2 create a network (there should be a tut the first time u log onto hamachi)
3 tell ppl ur network name and pass
4 let them log on once they are on your network then they use the ip at the top of your hamachi screen to log on once u have ran ur server
4 then you are on ur server!

Read full topic

item.title: Questions comments thoughts and concerns?
item.dc:creator: @adog17x adog17x
item.description:
@adog17x wrote:

[size=20pt]How to Host Your server.[/size]
1.make the sever.
2.If you use hamachi,your server ip will be at top of your screen.
3.go to your source,fix compiler,double click it , and there’s stuff…type r and enter then your server should run.

Read full topic

item.title: Questions comments thoughts and concerns?
item.dc:creator: @ownage-2007 ownage-2007
item.description:
@ownage-2007 wrote:

As Slivion Said:

The only ways to increase your memory is to;

  • Buy & Install A Larger Hard Drive.
  • Delete Programs Off Your HD and Minimise The Amount Of Programs Your Running On Your Desktop At The Same Time As Running Your Server.

Read full topic

item.title: Questions comments thoughts and concerns?
item.dc:creator: @Slivion Slivion
item.description:
@Slivion wrote:

● You’ve got to buy a bigger drive.
Or
● Delete programs on the drive.

Read full topic

item.title: Questions comments thoughts and concerns?
item.dc:creator: @Slivion Slivion
item.description:
@Slivion wrote:

Host A Server

● Create the actual Server.
● Sign up at No-Ip.
● Host a game.
● Portfoward.
● Advertise.

● For more information on this reading The Ultimate Server Guide helps.
